); */} import React, { useState } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; export default function CardPersonnels({ color = "light" }) { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(""); const [personnels, setPersonnels] = useState([ { id: 1, nom: "Jean Dupont", departement: "Informatique" }, { id: 2, nom: "Sophie Martin", departement: "Ressources Humaines" }, { id: 3, nom: "Ali Ben Salah", departement: "Finance" }, ]); const filteredPersonnels = personnels.filter((personnel) => personnel.nom.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); const handleAction = (action, id) => { switch (action) { case "voir": alert(`Voir le personnel avec l'ID ${id}`); break; case "modifier": alert(`Modifier le personnel avec l'ID ${id}`); break; case "supprimer": setPersonnels(personnels.filter((personnel) => personnel.id !== id)); break; default: break; } }; const handleAddPersonnel = () => { const newPersonnel = { id: personnels.length + 1, nom: "Nouveau Personnel", departement: "Nouveau DÃ©partement", }; setPersonnels([...personnels, newPersonnel]); }; return (

setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="px-3 py-2 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none border-blueGray-300 text-blueGray-700" />

); } CardPersonnels.propTypes = { color: PropTypes.string, };
